Articles.Content:
I am nearly complete with the Elcano Challenge and during my mission I have noticed that a Fathometer or Water Depth Indicator would be very helpful for Watercraft (Amphibians mainly). Does anything of the sort exist, maybe a Mod or within a Mod?

Edited November 15, 2015 by castille7
Answered with Magic!
Try asking DMagic, he has a whole mod dedicated to adding a gazillion science thingamabobs.

Try asking DMagic, he has a whole mod dedicated to adding a gazillion science thingamabobs.

Ok thank you Streetwind! but a Gazillion might not be enough he should keep building!.....lol

This can be added to SCANsat relatively easy:

It shows ocean depth right now, but I could also set it to show the depth of your craft if you are actually underwater.

This is awesome and so is the craft your showing here! I apologize for just getting back to this, I was caught up in the completion of the Kerbin Elcano Challenge. Here is the Craft I was looking to use it for.

Thanks again DMagic!
